name: Block Boxer
description:
Block Boxer is a simple arcade game requiring quick swiping and taping maneuvers. The goal is to defeat as many enemies as possible. Can you earn gold?

How to play
- Tap to change the color of your glove
- Swipe to punch and defeat the enemies

Features
- Simple game mechanics
- Increasing difficulty
- Enhanced for iPhone 6 / 6 plus
- No pop-up ads or video ads
